00035 //GPS commissioning exit mode values
00036 #define GPS_EXIT_ON_COMM_WINDOW_EXPIRATION   0x01
00037 #define GPS_EXIT_ON_FIRST_PAIRING_SUCCESS    0x02
00038 #define GPS_EXIT_ON_PROXY_COMM_MODE_EXIT     0x04
00039 
00040 //The default secuirty level as per spec: 0x06
00041 //Setting minGpdSecurityLevel to (0x02), protectionWithGpLinkKey enabled(0x01)
00042 #define ZGP_SINK_DEFAULT_SECURITY_LEVEL_ATTR_VALUE 0x06
00043 /******************************************************************************
00044                     Types
00045 ******************************************************************************/
00046 typedef enum PACK
00047 {
00048   COMM_IDLE = 0x00,
00049   COMM_RXD_GPD_KEY_DECRYPTION,
00050   COMM_WAITING_FOR_COMPLETE_COM_REQ_INFO,
00051   COMM_PROCESS_COMPLETE_COMM_INFO,
00052   COMM_COMM_REPLY_HANDLING,
00053   COMM_GPD_KEY_DERIVATION,
00054   COMM_TX_GPD_KEY_ENCRYPTION,
00055   COMM_FRAME_AND_SEND_COMM_REPLY,
00056   COMM_WAIT_FOR_SUCCCESS_IND,
00057   COMM_SUCCESSFUL_SESSION,
00058   COMM_COMPLETE,
00059   COMM_WAIT_FOR_PAIRING_CONFIG_TX
00060 } sinkCommProcState_t;
00061 
00062 typedef struct PACK
00063 {
00064   uint8_t rxChannelInNextAttempt      : 4;
00065   uint8_t rxChannelInSecondAttempt    : 4;
00066 } zgpChannelReq_t;
00067 
00068 typedef struct PACK
00069 {
00070   uint8_t operationalChannel    : 4;
00071   uint8_t basic                 : 1;
00072   uint8_t reserved              : 3;
00073 } zgpChannelConfig_t;
00074 
00075 typedef struct PACK
00076 {
00077   uint8_t panidPresent        : 1;
00078   uint8_t gpdSecurityKeyPresent  : 1;
00079   uint8_t gpdKeyEncryption    : 1;
00080   uint8_t securityLevel       : 2;
00081   uint8_t keyType             : 3;
00082 } zgpCommReplyOptions_t;
00083 
00084 typedef struct PACK
00085 {
00086   zgpCommReplyOptions_t options;

00088   uint8_t gpdSecurityKey[ZGP_SECURITY_KEY_LENGTH];

00090   uint32_t frameCounter;
00091 } zgpCommReply_t;
00092
